createAccount.description: Stake with Synthetix to enable the creation of synthetic assets on-chain. You earn yield but must also maintain your C-Ratio.

stake.receiveTokenTooltip: You will be minted an NFT that represents your account. You can easily transfer it between wallets.

createSynth.title: Create a Synth
createSynth.priceFeedAddressHelp: This contract must implement the Synthetix Price Feed Interface. <0>Review the documentation</0>
createSynth.feesInfo: No fees will be applied when this synth is minted or burned.

manage.title: Manage your staking position by adjusting your collateral and debt.
